title: Trading My T206 for Your Old Mill Backs
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Trading My T206 for Your Old Mill Backs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: James Gallo
I have the following cards and am looking for T206 with old mill backs.

Paskert Cycle 350 Fair
Jordan Skinned SC
Jacklitsch SC 150 Fact 25 Fair
Clark Columbus AB 350 Good
Lattimore AB 350 Fiar-Good
Payne EPDG Fair-Good
Magee with bat SW 350-460 Fact42 G-Vg

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206.jpg[/IMG]


Only have a handful of Old Mill back so looking for anything would prefer good ish card with nice centering.  SGC graded a plus.  I am looking to get the best deal in quanity or number of cards possible.  Drop me a line if you want to try to work something out.  Thanks


Looking for 1915 Cracker Jacks and 1909-11 American Caramel E90-1.
